description: A collection of circles in a roughly circular formation with a slightly flattened top; there is also a small ovular formation overlapping the top of the circular formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a very small, dark brown triangle at the top of the roughly circular formation where it meets the ovular formation and a lighter brown triangle to the right of the darker brown triangle.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
